mapper.insert: insert into violin_info ( id, name, code, price, author, mian_ban, bei_ban, ce_ban, you_qi, qin_xian, qin_ma, qin_gong, qin_he, zhi_ban, xian_zhou, wei_diao, wei_sheng, description, images, create_time, view_times, buy_url, market_time, is_hot )values( #{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{price}, #{author}, #{mianBan}, #{beiBan}, #{ceBan}, #{youQi}, #{qinXian}, #{qinMa}, #{qinGong}, #{qinHe}, #{zhiBan}, #{xianZhou}, #{weiDiao}, #{weiSheng}, #{description}, #{images}, #{createTime}, #{viewTimes}, #{buyUrl}, #{marketTime}, #{isHot} )

insert into violin_info ( id, name, code, price, author, mian_ban, bei_ban, ce_ban, you_qi, qin_xian, qin_ma, qin_gong, qin_he, zhi_ban, xian_zhou, wei_diao, wei_sheng, description, images, create_time, view_times, buy_url, market_time, is_hot )values ( #{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.code}, #{item.price}, #{item.author}, #{item.mianBan}, #{item.beiBan}, #{item.ceBan}, #{item.youQi}, #{item.qinXian}, #{item.qinMa}, #{item.qinGong}, #{item.qinHe}, #{item.zhiBan}, #{item.xianZhou}, #{item.weiDiao}, #{item.weiSheng}, #{item.description}, #{item.images}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.viewTimes}, #{item.buyUrl}, #{item.marketTime}, #{item.isHot} )

update.foreach:
update violin_info set id=#{item.id}, name=#{item.name}, code=#{item.code}, price=#{item.price}, author=#{item.author}, mian_ban=#{item.mianBan}, bei_ban=#{item.beiBan}, ce_ban=#{item.ceBan}, you_qi=#{item.youQi}, qin_xian=#{item.qinXian}, qin_ma=#{item.qinMa}, qin_gong=#{item.qinGong}, qin_he=#{item.qinHe}, zhi_ban=#{item.zhiBan}, xian_zhou=#{item.xianZhou}, wei_diao=#{item.weiDiao}, wei_sheng=#{item.weiSheng}, description=#{item.description}, images=#{item.images}, create_time=#{item.createTime}, view_times=#{item.viewTimes}, buy_url=#{item.buyUrl}, market_time=#{item.marketTime}, is_hot=#{item.isHot}
where id=#{item.id}
